subject: VAM feedback issues
description_text: vam motors seem to function properly within simsonn manager, but no output in game. Switched to simhub and they work in game but turn on and off every 2-3 seconds even at 10% power output. Any assistance would be appreciated, thank you.

conversations.body_text: Issue fixed, i had both simsonn manager and simhub open. Thanks and have a great day, love the products!
